thread.title: Barring unexpected freeze, most schools on schedule Wednesday
thread.title_full: Barring unexpected freeze, most schools on schedule Wednesday

author: Jeff Manning | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Barring unexpected freeze, most schools on schedule Wednesday
text: Good news for harried parents: Barring some dramatic change in the weather, school's on schedule Wedneday in most metro-area districts. Temperatures hovered just above freezing late Tuesday afternoon, making for more rain than ice. That prompted Portland Public Schools to...
